discourse_list.title: Forum maintenance announcement - Thursday, 8 September 2022 4:00-4:30 UTC

content.content: TechOps Core Unit is planning to perform maintenance work on MakerDAO forum. Maintenance is planned to happen in the interval between 4:00 and 4:30 UTC on Thursday 8 September 2022 (6:00-6:30 CET / 12:00am-12:30 am Wednesday EDT / 9:00 pm-9:30 pm Wednesday PDT) Activities will include:  Changing some configuration and configuration files on the server where forum is hosted Rebuilding the app and updating forum to the latest version Applying latest security patches Updating all plugins and add-ons to the latest versions.  During that time:  Forum might be unavailable or slow for 10-15 minutes All messages sent (for users that had forum open prior to maintenance start) during that time might be lost  We’ll try to do it as quickly as possible to not cause any major downtime. Anyway we are sorry for inconvenience. You can follow https://makerdao.statuspage.io/ for progress.
This work is now complete. Forum operations are nominal.
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
